markdownRemark.html: The school is located in the center of Marbella, near Plaza del Mar, below the Casa Nostra restaurant. At this dance school you can learn Salsa , Bachata , Cha Cha, Belly Dance and Argentinian Tango. There is no iage restriction for dancers! They offer classes for children , youth and adults. Everyone is welcome!
